1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Repetitive operators.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Subtext.Operator.Repeat
6 ( -- * Basic repetition
7   repeat, repeatTimes, repeatExpr,
8   min, max, minMax,
9
10   -- * Derived repetition
11   many, many1, maybe,
12   anySeq, before, sep,
13 ) where
14
15import Prelude hiding ( repeat, min, max, maybe )
16
17import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Subtext.Expr                as T
18import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Subtext.MinMax              as T
19import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Subtext.Operator.Basic      as T
20import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Subtext.Operator.Combine    as T
21
22
23-- ----------------------  Basic repetition
24
25-- | Repetition with min-max parameter.
26repeat :: T.MinMax -> T.Expr a -> T.Expr a
27repeat m = T.ERec . T.ERep m
28
29-- | Extract min-max parameter.
30repeatTimes :: T.Expr a -> Maybe T.MinMax
31repeatTimes (T.ERec (T.ERep t _))  = Just t
32repeatTimes _                      = Nothing
33
34-- | Extract internal expression.
35repeatExpr :: T.Expr a -> Maybe (T.Expr a)
36repeatExpr (T.ERec (T.ERep _ e))   = Just e
37repeatExpr _                       = Nothing
38
39-- | Repetition with lower bound.
40min :: Int -> T.Expr a -> T.Expr a
41min a = repeat $ T.Min a
42
43-- | Repetition upper bound.
44max :: Int -> T.Expr a -> T.Expr a
45max = minMax 0
46
47-- | Repetition with lower and upper bound.
48minMax :: Int -> Int -> T.Expr a -> T.Expr a
49minMax a b = repeat $ T.MinMax a b
50
51
52-- ----------------------  Derived repetition
53
54-- | Match zero or more times.
55many :: T.Expr a -> T.Expr a
56many = min 0
57
58-- | Match one or more times.
59many1 :: T.Expr a -> T.Expr a
60many1 = min 1
61
62-- | Match zero or one times.
63maybe :: T.Expr a -> T.Expr a
64maybe = minMax 0 1
65
66-- | Many of any.
67anySeq :: T.Expr a
68anySeq = many T.any
69
70-- | Match before given expression.
71before :: T.Expr a -> T.Expr a
72before = many . T.anyNot
73
74-- | X-separated values.
75sep :: T.Expr a -> T.Expr a -> T.Expr a
76sep x e = T.seq [many $ T.seq [e, x], maybe e]
